course_description: Open to the Candler community without audition. Weekly rehearsals and regular participation in chapel services. A maximum of four hours of credit in CM530R may count toward elective requirements for the MDiv or MTS. A limited number of hours can count toward Area of Specialization for MRL worship and music students. (S/U grading basis only).
sections: Class Nbr: 4208, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 12:15-1:15p, Instructor: D. Daniel, Status: Open
